start_gcode.label: Start Gcode
start_gcode.default_value:
;----------- Start Gcode -----------
M2000 ;custom:line mode
M888 P0 ;custom:header is write_draw
;-----------------------------------

work_speed.label: Work Speed
work_speed.description: Determines how fast the front end moves when it’s working.

jog_speed.label: Jog Speed
jog_speed.description: Determines how fast the front end moves when it’s not working.

jog_pen_offset.label: Jog Pen Offset
jog_pen_offset.description: Determines the offset of the pen when it is not drawn.
